text: @realDonaldTrump @JayInslee Joe Biden was at the Protests. Joe Biden met with people while you were hiding in the basement of the people's house behind a fence. Joe Biden is setting an example through leadership because a void exists. We are going to hit +200k dead from COVID19. Shut your tweet hole.
